snippet.title: Demon Spore gameplay trailer - action horror roguelite with tentacle spreading viral monster
snippet.description:
Demon Spore is a terrifying twin-stick shooter roguelite inspired by 80s monster movies where you need to improvise a plan to escape from a constantly evolving life form that is spreading out of control.

I've been working on it for several years and have just released a demo which you can download here:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1808160/Demon_Spore/

You need to use every tool you can find in the lab to survive, and plan your moves carefully to avoid the contamination reaching you before you escape. It is atmospheric, tense and brutal... and super addictive!

#monster #tentacles #roguelike #roguelite #indiedev #indiegame
